item.title: K8S tutorial EP2
item.description: basic service with official template # kubectl apply -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubernetes/dashboard/v1.10.1/src/deploy/recommended/kubernetes-dashboard.yaml check status, note that ClusterIP is used and dashboard service can only be accessed by proxy # kubectl --namespace=kube-system get service kubernetes-dashboard if you prefer to access dashborad by https://:, then edit service and change type: ClusterIP to type: NodePort # kubectl --namespace=kube-system edit service kubernetes-dashboard make sure service and pod are running properly add admin priviledge # cat dashboard-admin.

item.title: K8S tutorial EP1
item.description: overall install install docker # sudo apt-get install apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl software-properties-common # curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - # sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs) stable" # apt-get update && apt-get install -y docker-ce HTTP/HTTPS proxy (optional) # docker pull rancher/server Using default tag: latest Error response from daemon: Get https://registry-1.docker.io/v2/: net/http: request canceled while waiting for connection (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers) # mkdir /etc/systemd/system/docker.
